Subject: Destination address for content aware policy
Description: We're conducting an investigation regarding data exfiltration and notice that there's no actual destination in the logged data. We can see what vehicle the end user used to transmit the data, but we don't seem to have any record of the destination at to where those files were transmitted. is that a setting we don't have enabled? How can we find out the IP address of where the data transmitted ended up?
What_We_Know__c: Customer did not have Reporting V2 enabled.
Solution_Comment__c: Enabling Reporting v2 resolved the issue.
